DOC.brief_summary: Aim study investigate impact meal skipping ( breakfast dinner skip ) regulation glucose metabolism macronutrient balance ( protein/fat/carbohydrate intake vs. -oxidation ) . An isoenergetic diet 3 conventional meal ( breakfast , lunch , dinner ) serve control .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Meal Skipping Macronutrient Oxidation Glucose Metabolism Under Isocaloric Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: The duration study 7 day include 3 day control diet 4 day ( include 5 night ) metabolic chamber Institute Nutritional Medicine University Hohenheim . The study phase metabolic chamber consist ( ) 1 day 3 meals/day = baseline day , ( ii ) 1 day breakfast skipping , ( iii ) 1 day dinner skipping , ( iv ) 1 washout day subject leave chamber 7 a.m. 7 p.m.. Beginning 3rd study day macronutrient energy intake well fast period keep constant . To achieve comparable condition washout day setted baseline day .
DOC.criteria: healthy obese ( BMI < 30 ) food allergy smoke alternative nutrition habit chronic disease regular medication intake claustrophobia
